title: AHS 8 Apocalypse Best Fan Theories
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Remember.. all the ghosts from Murder House 🏠 can LEAVE the house on ONE DAY OF THE YEAR HALLOWEEN.. the plot twist will likely occur on the Halloween 🎃 episode
I don’t think that the picture you showed of “Evan Peters with weight gain” is Evan Peters I think that it’s Sharon needles from rupauls drag race

Maybe the hand IS a burned witch which so happens to be THE ORIGINAL WITCH. Now stay with me. Her power has to be so strong and I know she has some communication with the man down under. Maybe she becomes his right hand (maybe with devious plans of her own) and nourishes the baby, keeping an eye on him. The reason Cordelia may be in trouble is because Scathage wants her supreme position back and orders Michael to kill her.

Queenie was part of the council by the end of Coven.  And we see her die in the Cortez in Season 5.  The witches then go to L.A. in search of Queenie and All HELL breaks loose.  which is probably the twist in episode 5,
OMG imagine ghost Violet talking to Zoe 😂😂😂 LOL
